rooms.description: North-facing entrance with Vastu compliant space allowing positive energy flow and secure ambiance. Decorated with natural materials.
Open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen for Mediterranean style living. Large windows and sliding glass doors to connect with exterior space.
Open plan kitchen that flows seamlessly into the living area. Designed with Mediterranean influences.
Dining area adjacent to the open-plan kitchen and living area. Incorporates Mediterranean design elements.
A peaceful library space located near the entrance to maintain calm and quiet. Designed with proper lighting to reduce glare.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door designed with traditional Mediterranean design and Vastu-compliant alignment.
Large window to connect the open-plan living and kitchen spaces with natural light.
Door from entrance hall to library.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and a private balcony overlooking the rooftop terrace.
Second bedroom designed with Mediterranean aesthetics and ample natural light.
Third bedroom with a focus on privacy and quiet. Uses Vastu principles for energy flow.
En-suite bathroom for the master bedroom. Designed with modern Mediterranean fixtures.

openings.description: Staircase connecting ground floor to first floor. Placed according to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.description: Rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and Mediterranean-style seating. Equipped with outdoor lighting.

openings.description: Ladder leading from first floor to rooftop terrace.
